effect.shortEffect: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.
effect.full: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.

description.sun-moon: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
description.sword-shield: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
